title: Stat Mania IELTS Docs
text: This websites acts as a catalog of useful resources on IELTS.

title: Stat Mania IELTS Docs
text:
IELTS Format







Section
About




Listening* (30 minutes)
Four recorded monologues and conversations


Reading (60 mintues)
- Three long reading passages with tasks - Texts may include diagrams, graphs or illustrations - Texts are taken from books, journals, magazines and newspapers


Writing (60 mintues)
- Summarise, describe or explain a table, graph, chart or diagram - Short eassy task of at least 250 words


Speaking* (11 to 14 mintues)
- Face-to-Face interview without disruptions or distractions - Incldues short questions, speaking at length about a familiar topic and a structured discussion
